column1: International Business Management with Project Management MSc
column3: Guildhall School of Business and Law
column5: Why study this course?The International Business Management with Project Management MSc degree will give you a systematic understanding of business organisations, their external environment and how they create value sustainably, with a special focus on the area of project management. The degree programme focuses on providing knowledge for practical use, allowing you to develop business management skills that will enhance your career. Guided by our staff, you'll learn the theory and practice of business management.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
